thread.title: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Wall St closes higher in volatile session
thread.title_full: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Wall St closes higher in volatile session | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Wall St closes higher in volatile session
text:
NEW YORK, July 7 U.S. stocks ended a volatile session higher on Tuesday, with the S&P 500 recovering from a drop of more than 1 percent as energy shares gained alongside an afternoon rebound in crude oil prices.
The Dow Jones industrial average rose 95.94 points, or 0.54 percent, to 17,779.52, the S&P 500 gained 12.84 points, or 0.62 percent, to 2,081.6 and the Nasdaq Composite added 5.52 points, or 0.11 percent, to 4,997.46. (Reporting by Ryan Vlastelica ; Editing by Chizu Nomiyama )
